title: Linda
text: I had few doubts at the beginning for the price that was 200â‚¬ cheaper than the official airplane company website and as my name was weirdly changed with "mrs" at the end not like to indicate that was my status but like a chsnge of my real name! But everything goes well at the end! I didn't give full stars for this problem that give useless preoccupation and i think needs to be solved.
